#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
const int M = 1e9 + 7;
LL inv(LL a, LL n = M - 2) {
  LL r = 1;
  for (; n; n >>= 1) {
    if (n & 1) r = r * a % M;
    a = a * a % M;
  }
  return r;
}


int main() {
  int n; scanf("%d", &n);
  vector<int> l(n);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) scanf("%d", &l[i]);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    for (int j = n; --j > i;) {
      l[j] = (l[j] + M - 1ll * l[j - 1] * (i + 1) % M) % M;
    }
  }
  for (int i = n; --i >= 0;) {
    for (int j = i; --j >= 0;) {
      l[i] = 1ll * l[i] * inv(i - j) % M;
      l[j] = (l[j] + M - l[i]) % M;
    }
  }
  for (int x = 0; x < n; ++x) {
    LL r = 0;
    for (int i = n; --i >= 0; ) {
      r = (r * x % M + l[i]) % M;
    }
    r = r * x % M;
    printf("%lld%c", r, " \n"[x == n - 1]);
  }
  return 0;
}
